content: media pocket by jeffiknitter materials approximately 100yds/50gr of a dk weight yarn shown here in tosh dk from madelinetosh colorway tart needles your preferred method for knitting in the round 3 5mm us4 gauge 20 stitches & 36 row = 4 in stockinette stitch final dimensions unstretched for 3rd and 4th generation kindles 7 3/4 x 4 final dimensions unstretched for 1st and 2nd generation kindles 9 x 4 for 3rd and 4th generation kindles the kindle touch and the kindle fire using judy s magic cast on http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html and 3 5mm double pointed needles or a 40 circular needle cast on 64 stitches knit in the round for 3 row then begin cable chart on page 3 chart contains a 32 stitch repeat which you will do twice over the 64 stitches repeat 24 row of chart one more time then repeat row 1-11 see next for written instructions 1st row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 2nd and every even numbered row k and p the sts as they appear 3rd row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 2/2lpc 2/2rpc twice p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 5th row k2 p2 1/1lc p4 c4f p4 c4f p4 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 7th row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 2/2rpc 2/2lpc twice p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 9th row as 1st row 11th row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p2 2/2rpc 2/2lpc p2 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 13th row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p2 k2 p4 k2 p2 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 15th row k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p2 2/2lpc 2/2rpc p2 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice 17th row as 1st row 19th row as 3rd row 21st row as 5th row 23rd row as 7th row 24th row as 2nd row repeat these 24 row one more time then repeat row 1-11 written and charted directions continue here next row k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 p2tog p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 twice next row k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2tog p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 twice 1 next row k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 twice repeat this row 5 more times or as many times as you d like to make the ribbed top of the pocket the 3rd generation kindle and the kindle fire are 0 7 longer then the kindle touch or the 4th generation kindle so you might want to add a few extra row here bind off and enjoy for a 1st or 2nd generation kindle cast on 66 stitches the two extra stitches will be at the beginning and end of each row repeat like this example using row 1 k1 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice k1 after 2 repeats of the cable chart repeat row 1-11 and then
